id.description: Unique identifier for the interview data.

application_id.description: Unique identifier for the job application.

external_event_id.description: ID of the external event associated with the interview.

start.description: Details about the start time of the interview.

date_time.description: Start date and time of the interview.

end.description: Details about the end time of the interview.

date_time.description: End date and time of the interview.

location.description: Location where the interview takes place.

video_conferencing_url.description: URL for the video conferencing platform used for the interview.

status.description: Status of the interview (e.g., scheduled, completed).

created_at.description: Date and time when the application interview data was created.

updated_at.description: Date and time when the application interview data was last updated.

interview.description: Details of the interview such as type or category.

id.description: Unique identifier for the interview type.

name.description: Name or title of the interview.

organizer.description: Details of the organizer or coordinator of the interview.

interviewers.description: List of interviewers participating in the interview panel.

response_status.description: Status of the interviewer's response (e.g., confirmed, pending).

scorecard_id.description: Unique identifier for the interviewer's scorecard, if applicable.
